doc.title: Into the Blue: Dolphin Rescue
doc.plot: For dolphins incarcerated in bare concrete pools around the world, the turquoise blue of the Caribbean must seem like a distant dream. Yet, in 1991, three former captives of the oceanarium industry were flown out of Europe to the British West Indies. This is the story of their flight to freedom, and their return to the wild. Narrated by Michael Caine.
